Posts.EditableText: Looks like we need someone who can read the language the uncategorized games are written in and either categorize them, or tell me where to place them.  I think it's Russian?
Posts.HTML: Looks like we need someone who can read the language the uncategorized games are written in and either categorize them, or tell me where to place them. I think it's Russian?

Posts.EditableText:
The two Russian ones feel like horror to me. My Russian isn't that good, but Google Translate helps.

I don't read Spanish or Greek, I'm afraid. But Google probably handles them well enough to give an idea of the genre. The Greek one says it's an interactive version of a story from Grimm's Fairy Tales; not sure if that would put it in fantasy or literature.
